item.title: Build Your Own Private Cloud Storage
item.description:
Lots of small and midsize businesses are using cloud storage, particularly for disaster recovery. However, local storage is still necessary. While Storage Attached Networks (SANs) are a common solution, they’re expensive and complex. A simpler option exists. Introducing Drobo, an advanced hard disk storage solution that’s surprisingly easy to use. It works with standard 3.5" SATA drives of any capacity, resembling a straightforward multi-bay drive enclosure. Adding or removing drives, even swapping a 1 TB for a 2 TB, is always possible...

item.title: Drobo Mr. Storage Roboto
item.description:
Hard drive space disappears faster than you can imagine, especially with large digital media files like photos and videos. Even large hard drives fill up quickly. While upgrading or adding hard drives seems like a solution, it creates new problems like managing backups and worrying about data loss from hard drive failures. These tasks can be time-consuming, especially for professionals working with large files. It’s almost like you need a personal assistant to manage it all...
